summary: A cozy underground player home outside of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION

A cozy player home, Shadow Shroud Den is located in the mountainside on the southern outskirts of Riverwood. You will automatically get the location on your map. As far as crafting, the den includes a sharpening wheel, tanning rack, cooking pot, alchemy table, and an enchanting table. If you appreciate this mod, please endorse it.

Enjoy
-Loofisto

INSTALLATION

Unzip the package.
then just drag the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim program directory.

TERMS OF USE

If you want to tweak, update, incorporate or convert my mod for anything else, just message me on here and we can talk.
author: loofisto
